questions.question: Wabonye gute muri rusangi iyi reresi?
answers: Nayikunze kandi yari ngira kamaro
Ntaho mpagaze kandi nibaza ko vyoba vyari ngira kamaro canke atari ngira kamaro
Sinahimbawe n'iyi reresi kandi nibaza ko itari ngira kamaro

questions.question: Ni ubuhe bushobozi buri muri ino reresi?
answers: Gukorera mu runani rwiza
Kutadohoka
kwubaka ubwonko bwawe

questions.question: Ni iyihe ntumbero y'agakorwa?
answers: Gufasha abanyeshure kwiga ukugene bakorera mu runani
Gufasha abanyeshure ukwitaho
Gufasha abanyeshure gutegura amahangiro n'integuro zishikwako

questions.question: Iyo abanyeshure badashobora gutegura ihangiro, woshobora kubafasha gute?
answers: kubabwira bacape ifoto y'umuryango wabo
Gusangira n'abanyeshure bawe uturorero twawe nyezina mu kubatera intege
Kubwira abanyeshure kutabibamwo

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Sinosubira guhitamwo abanyeshure barenga babiri mu gusabikanya amahangiro n'intambuko zabo
Notegerezwa kuvuga gusa ku mahangiro yanje
Notegerezwa kubwira abanyeshure ko amahangiro yabo ari mabi

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Notegerezwa gusaba abanyeshure kwerekana amahangiro yabo
Notegerezwa gutanga uturorero tw'ibishobisho
Notegerezwa kwumviriza neza abanyeshure no kubabwira uko vyagenze

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu utotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Sinotegerezwa gutera intege abanyeshure
Sinotegerezwa kubwira abanyeshure uko amahingiro yoshobora kuba ameze
Sinotegerezwa gusobanura ico arico ihangiro nyezina, rigezweho kandi rishikwako

questions.question: Ni ibiki umunyeshure yoshobora kuvuga mu mwanya wo kurongora ikiganiro c'aka gakorwa?
answers: Aka gakorwa karamfashije kwitaho gukurikira
Twotegerezwa ibihe vyose kubaza ibibazo bitanu mu gihe turi mu matati
Igihe cose nkeneye gukora ikintu, ubu rero noshobora gushiraho integuro n'intambuko nshobora gukoresha bukebuke kugira nshike kw'ihangiro ryanje

questions.question: Iyo ushoboye kwimenyereza aka gakorwa imisi myinshi ikurikirana, wokora iki?
answers: Gusaba abanyeshure basangiye amahangiro yabo ubuheruka kutabamwo

Guhindura ubwoko bw'amhangiro ibihe vyose wimenyereje .shiraho amahangiro y'ishure umusi umwe n'amahangiro yo gukorana n'umuryango ubukurikira hanyuma amahangiro y'ibikorwa vy'inyuma y'ishure uwundi musi inyuma y'ivyo.
Hitamwo barya banyeshure nyene mu gusabikanya amahangiro yabo buri musi.
